DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether administration test article decrease occurrence ventricular arrhythmia patient acute coronary syndrome ( unstable angina , ST segment elevate myocardial infarction myocardial infarction without ST elevation ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating GAP-486 Non-Sustained Ventricular Tachycardia
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Male female patient , 18 year age old , experience acute ischemic event within 24 hour prior study entry . Patients document history coronary artery disease leave ventricular dysfunction Patients experience episode nonsustained ventricular tachycardia within 24 hour index ischemic event EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) , thrombolytic , openheart surgery within 48 hour prior study entry , require test article administration Patients take another antiarrhythmic medication ( beta blocker ) within 5 halflives start test article Patients history torsades de pointes , long QT syndrome , QTc > 0.50
